Class TermExtractor

  • public class TermExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that extracts terms according to different definitions. Only one definition is given now. The distinction among languages should be done here.

    • Method Detail

      • getTerms

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTerms(java.lang.String text,
                                        int minimumSize)
        Transforms the content of a String into a set of terms. A term is obtained as follows:
        1. The content is converted to lower case
        2. The tokens which are composed only by punctuation and symbols are removed.
        3. The tokens which appears in the stopwords list are removed
        4. The remaining tokens are stemmed with a Snowball/Lucene Stemmer
        5. Diacritics are removed (Now it is needed for French and Romanian only \\TODO)
        6. It selects only the tokens composed by letters and with a minimum size (usually 4 characters, but always 3 for Arabic).
        Parameters:
        text - The String from which terms are extracted.
        minimumSize - integer with the minimum size to keep a token as a term
        Returns:
        The list of tokens resulting of the treatment explained above.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        args -
